headline: Show HN: Thentic – API for NFT-commerce
description:
Hi everybody! Thentic provides 10 REST API methods to mint, trade and manage NFTs across 286 Ethereum Virtual Machine Compatible Blockchains. You can create and embed blockchain transactions to your web applications using Transaction URL or Transaction Pixel.

docs - https://thentic.gitbook.io/api-docs/
